alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 9:38PM MST until January 08 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 4 inches, with the heaviest amounts south of I-70. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver, Denver, and Byers. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Snow and blowing snow will reduce visibility at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.
